name: Boston: Fenway Health Ansin Building
instructions: Appointments for all eligible people 18 and older. This site is accessible by public transportation and by car. The Green Line D Branch Fenway stop is a five minute walk and the Green Line Kenmore Square stop is a 15 minute walk. The 55 Bus stops one block away. The Orange Line�s Ruggles T stop is a 20 minute walk. There is meter and garage parking in the neighborhood.
accessibility: Accessible to those in wheelchairs or with mobility impairments. We use interpreter iPads for ASL and foreign language interpretation during vaccine appointments.

name: Boston: Fenway South End
instructions: Appointments for all eligible people 18 and older. The vaccination clinic is on the building�s 2nd floor. 142 Berkeley Street is accessible by public transportation and by car. We are a 5 minute walk from the Orange Line�s Back Bay T station and a 15 minute walk from the Copley Square or Arlington T stops on the Green Line. There is meter and garage parking in the neighborhood.
accessibility: Accessible to those in wheelchairs or with mobility impairments. We use interpreter iPads for ASL and foreign language interpretation during vaccine appointments.

name: Boston: South Boston Community Health Center
additional_info: Appointments available Monday-Friday
instructions:
We offer direct scheduling for 1st doses and catch-up 2nd doses.
Please arrive at the back door off of Silver St.
No parking available

name: Boston: Tufts Medical Center at Courtyard by Marriott Boston Downtown
additional_info: If you currently qualify for a vaccine, please go to our website to schedule an appointment and register for your visit. Please do not call Tufts MC or the Courtyard by Marriott.
instructions: The Courtyard by Marriott is accessible by the MBTA Orange Line, �Tufts Medical Center� stop and the Green Line, �Boylston St� stop. Additionally, by bus 11 or the Silver Line to �Washington St at Tufts Med Ctr� stop and bus 43 to �285 Tremont Street� stop. For non-English speaking community members, we will have interpreter services present to help answer any questions.
accessibility: The vaccination site is wheelchair accessible and staff are available to assist with wheelchair access. We have wheelchairs onsite for use.

additional_info: Please use the website scheduler before calling Hannaford. Please do not call the pharmacy if no appointments are available; instead, check back later for additional openings. Vaccine is available by appointment only to those that are designated to be vaccinated according to the state's priority groups.
instructions: All patients are required to wear a mask. Please do not arrive at the pharmacy more than five minutes before your scheduled appointment time. Bring your driver�s license and insurance card. All patients will be asked to wait in the pharmacy area for a required observation for 15-30 minutes after receiving their vaccination.

name: Walpole: Big Y
instructions: Vaccine is available by appointment only. Appointments can be made online. Please bring insurance card and/or state ID if you have one.

name: Webster: Price Chopper
address: East Village Square, 2 Worcester Rd, Webster, MA 01570
instructions: Vaccine is available by appointment only. Appointments can be made online. Please bring insurance card and/or state ID if you have one.

name: Webster: Webster Medical Center
instructions: Please enter the building parking lot from the Town Forest Road entrance; there is no parking lot entry from Cudworth Road. Vaccinations will be delivered on the ground level facing Cudworth Road. Individuals requesting vaccine information should contact DPH. Please do not call our phone line or enter the building to get information; our staff is unable to answer these questions. If you need help signing up for a vaccination appointment please call 2-1-1.

name: West Barnstable: Cape Cod Community College (Barnstable County Dept. of Health and Environment)
instructions: Go to the main entrance at Cape Cod Community College and you will be given further instructions. See a campus map: https://www.capecod.edu/media/capecodedu/content-assets/documents/campus-map.pdf
accessibility: Wheelchair accessible with staff available to provide assistance if necessary.
days_open: Will vary, please click link to see available appointments.
